text: anak del meanotropy sa mb tde chraen chaur aoy ke brichcheak aoy ban samoromy ampi tropy sa mb tde robsa ke . rie anaknea del tropy sa mb tde robsa ke meankamnt chaur aoy ke brichcheak towteam avei del a l laoh ban phdal aoy ke . a l laoh poum dakbantouk leu bokkol na mneak krawpi avei del trong ban phdal aoy ke laey . a l laoh nung phdal aoy mean pheap ngeayosruol vinh banteabpi mean pheap lombak
